Package datas

Class Cd

java.lang.Object
datas.Cd
public class Cd extends Object
A CD is a set of music tracks. The CD is characterized by a title, an interpreter(s). When it is created, the CD is empty. By engraving it, it will be filled progressively of tracks
Author:
Aurelia Segarra

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cd(String leFich)
    Constructor for a CD from a text file CD title and interpreter The different tracks as follow TitrePlage/ InterpretePlage/ X min/ Y sec The private method "graverCD (String leFich)" read the text file
    Cd(String interpreteCD, String titreCD)
    Constructor for a CD, 2 steps : Creation of the CD Engraving the CD with the private method "graverCD()"

  • Constructor Details

    • Cd

      public Cd(String interpreteCD, String titreCD)
      Constructor for a CD, 2 steps :
      1. Creation of the CD
      2. Engraving the CD with the private method "graverCD()"
      Parameters:
      interpreteCD - CD interpreter
      titreCD - CD title

    • Cd

      public Cd(String leFich)
      Constructor for a CD from a text file
      • CD title and interpreter
      • The different tracks as follow TitrePlage/ InterpretePlage/ X min/ Y sec
      The private method "graverCD (String leFich)" read the text file
      Parameters:
      leFich - The text file

      public datas.Plagecd getUnePlage(int index)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the track of the array (index-1)

    • graverCD

      private void graverCD(String leFich)
      Private method to engrave the CD from a file. The CD have a title, an interpreter and a list of tracks
      Parameters:
      leFich - the text file to read

    • graverCD

      private void graverCD()
      Private method to engrave the CD. Simplified version with tracks created and added to the CD
